name: Chrome alpha
description:
Create your own CYBER-FIGHTER in Chrome alpha and fight other contenders in lag-based deadly melee combat! The more your character is chromed out, the stronger they are, but the bigger the lag!

Will you choose to play "pure", with no cybernetic enhancements and no lag, or will you delve deeply in body modifications? Print your cyber-fighter and customize it now!

Using a controller is highly recommended:
Left stick - move
Right stick - rotate
Bumpers - attack (one per hand)

Fonts:
Prototype by Justin Callaghan
Barcade by Iconian fonts

Musics:
Parry addiction & The story so far © SEGA
